title: com.apple.security
description: Preference Domain: com.apple.security,  Application: macOS Security Preferences

dontAllowFireWallUI.title: Enable or disable the macOS Firewall UI
dontAllowFireWallUI.description: If true, disables user changes to the firewall settings.

enum_titles: false - macOS Lock Firewall UI Enabled - Default
true - macOS Lock Firewall UI Disabled

dontAllowLockMessageUI.title: Enable or disable the macOS Lock Message UI
dontAllowLockMessageUI.description: If true, disables user changes to the lock message.

enum_titles: false - macOS Lock Message UI Enabled - Default
true - macOS Lock Message UI Disabled

dontAllowPasswordResetUI.title: Enable or disable the macOS Password Reset UI
dontAllowPasswordResetUI.description: If true, disables user changes to the password.

enum_titles: false - Password Reset UI Enabled - Default
